author: juliusu
title: NFT Trading Platform / DApp
description: Like art collectors, NFT holders may not wish to sell their pieces. However, they are willing to trade their NFTs for other NFT valuable.
solution: Create a smart-contract-based platform where NFT holders could put up their NFTs for trading and receive proposals for trades.
experience:
4 years of IT/management consulting for international companies
4 years of building and growing online businesses
3 years in crypto space
